"Challenge Blocks":
"This explains Challenge Blocks.

Challenge Blocks are blocks where you can take Challenge Quests.

In Challenge Blocks, players' levels and equipment are temporarily restricted so that training can take place in a controlled
environment.

Some other functions such as Client Orders have also been restricted, but rest assured that they will return to normal when you return to a normal block."

"In Challenge Blocks, just like normal blocks, quests can be taken from the Quest Counter.

You can use the Teleporter to move to another Challenge Block, or to return to your original block."

"By accessing the Challenge Monument in a Challenge Block, you can view the Challenge Quest rankings.

Take on a Challenge Quest and aim to be number 1.

â€»Rankings are reset regularly"
